text.name: Wingbeat
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Heal 15% of Max HP on self
[OnSucceedAttackHead] Reuse this Coin (5 times per Skill)
[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self by 4~8% of damage dealt

text.name: Wingbeat
text.desc: If this Skill's healing exceeds this unit's max HP, redirect the excess healing to 1 ally with the least HP percentage instead
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Heal <style="highlight">18% of Max HP on self
[OnSucceedAttackHead] Reuse this Coin (5 times per Skill)
[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self by <style="highlight">6~10% of damage dealt

text.name: Wingbeat
text.desc: If this Skill's healing exceeds this unit's max HP, redirect the excess healing to 1 ally with the least HP percentage instead
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Heal <style="highlight">20% of Max HP on self
[OnSucceedAttackHead] Reuse this Coin (5 times per Skill)
[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self by <style="highlight">8~12% of damage dealt

passiveList.name: Gluttony
passiveList.desc:
If the main target took HP damage this turn and isn't at max HP at Skill Use:
On Hit,
- When this unit is at max HP, deal +5~+10% damage.
- When this unit isn't at max HP, heal 2~5 HP. 
(7 times per turn)

text.name: Wingbeat
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets the unit with the least Core HP
[BeforeAttack] Deal 5% HP damage to at most 5 random other allies
- Heal HP on self equal to the damage dealt to allies.
- If this unit dealt damage to an ally, gain 2 [Enhancement] this turn, and gain 2 [Agility] next turn.
(Once per turn. The 'dealt damage' includes damage dealt to Shield HP. This effect can kill allies.)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackTail] Heal self by 10% of damage dealt

text.name: Wingbeat
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets the unit with the least Core HP
<style="highlight">[BeforeAttack] Gain (# of highest Reson. -2) Atk Weight (max 1)
[BeforeAttack] Deal 5% HP damage to at most 5 random other allies
- Heal HP on self equal to the damage dealt to allies.
- If this unit dealt damage to an ally, gain 2 [Enhancement] this turn, and gain 2 [Agility] next turn.
(Once per turn. The 'dealt damage' includes damage dealt to Shield HP. This effect can kill allies.)
<style="highlight">[EndSkill] If this Skill's healing exceeds this unit's max HP, gain (excess heal/max HP) x 10 [AttackUp] next turn. (max 3 per turn)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackTail] Heal self by <style="highlight">15% of damage dealt

- Heal HP on self equal to the damage dealt to allies.
- If this unit dealt damage to an ally, gain 2 [Enhancement] this turn, and gain 2 [Agility] next turn.
(Once per turn. The 'dealt damage' includes damage dealt to Shield HP. This effect can kill allies.)
[EndSkill] If this Skill's healing exceeds this unit's max HP, gain (excess heal/max HP) x 10 [AttackUp] next turn. (max <style="highlight">6 per turn)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackTail] Heal self by <style="highlight">20% of damage dealt
